channel.title: Enigma Machine (Part 2) :: Intro CS Textbook
channel.description: YouTube Video Resources Slides Video Script I present to you the German Enigma machine. The Enigma machine was used to encode messages during World War Two. And it was a really interesting piece of equipment. It used several different rotors that were rotated to create a key for the encryption, and used a plug board and a keyboard for inputs. And so as we saw in the video with the Enigma machine, you would set the rotors to a particular key.
